turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How may I be of assistance?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks for pick-up in Oak Creek, Wisconsin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, it looks like the nearest one is on state.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's that's the correct one. All right, for my order I'm going to have a iced coffee mocha, a grande iced caffe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream, and that will be all for my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, that's a grande iced mocha with whipped cream and 2%, did I miss anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful. I've placed your order with the starbucks on State in Oak Creek wisconsin.
